name: Windows Defender AMSI Trigger Detected
description: Detects triggering of AMSI by Windows Defender.
query: (winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:1116 AND winlog.event_data.Source\ Name:/[Aa][Mm][Ss][Ii]/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Microsoft\-Windows\-Windows\ Defender\/Operational AND event.code:1116 AND winlog.event_data.Source\ Name:AMSI)`
